title: JSE's Newton-King: Mining Is No Longer Only Opportunity (Audio)
itunes:title: JSE's Newton-King: Mining Is No Longer Only Opportunity (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: CEO of the Johannesburg Stock Exchange, Nicky Newton-King, discusses the impact of a US rate hike on South African asset classes, the threat of a credit downgrade, and opportunities for investment.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
